import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { School, Users, BookOpen, PieChart, Brain, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; import jhsBackground from '../../images/kids.jpgg'; // Make sure this path is correct const ContributeJHS = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ schoolType: '', schoolName: '', location: '', contactName: '', contactEmail: '', contactPhone: '', numberOfStudents: 0 }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const getPromptInfo = (type) => { const info = { 'KIDS': { price: 500, label: 'Kid' }, 'Primary School': { price: 1000, label: 'Primary School Student' }, 'Junior High School': { price: 1500, label: 'JHS Student' } }; return info[type] || { price: 0, label: 'Student' }; }; return (

Empower Young Minds

Transform your students into problem solvers and critical thinkers!

Register Your School for Innovation Training

{formData.schoolType && formData.numberOfStudents >= 20 && (

Great! You're registering {formData.numberOfStudents} {getPromptInfo(formData.schoolType).label}s. The total contribution would be GHC {formData.numberOfStudents * getPromptInfo(formData.schoolType).price}.

Your students will embark on an exciting journey of problem-solving and critical thinking!

)}

We'll reach out to you shortly after registration to discuss the next steps.

); }; export default ContributeJHS;
